Metadata.descriptionHome: PetVet is a small veterinary practice located in Bihac, Bosnia and Herzegovina, specializing in the care of small pets. Our experienced team provides compassionate and comprehensive veterinary services to ensure the health and well-being of your beloved pets.
Metadata.descriptionServices: Explore PetVet's comprehensive range of pet care services designed to meet all your pet's needs. From balanced nutrition and professional grooming to regular health check-ups and essential vaccinations, our team of dedicated professionals is here to ensure your pet's health and happiness. Discover how we can support you in providing the best care for your furry friend.
Metadata.descriptionContact: Get in touch with PetVet for all your pet care needs. Whether you have questions about our services, need to schedule an appointment, or seek advice on pet health, our team is here to help. Contact us via phone, email, or visit our location for personalized care and support.
Metadata.descriptionAboutUs: PetVet is a leading veterinary clinic in Bihać with over 5 years of experience in providing top-quality veterinary care. We offer modern treatments to improve the health and quality of life of your pets with reliability and professionalism. Visit us to learn more!

NotFound.description: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.

HeroSection.description: We prioritize your pet's health with love and expertise. Join us on a journey of care where your pet takes center stage.

marqueeText.part1: Our goal is to provide tailored care, ensuring
marqueeText.part2: each pet receives the attention necessary
marqueeText.part3: and personalized for their age and health condition.

ServicesSection.description: Pet care encompasses a wide range of responsibilities, from feeding and grooming to regular check-ups and vaccinations. Our team of professionals is here to help you with all your pet care needs.

WhyUsSection.description1: We understand that every pet is unique and has different needs.That's why we take a tailored approach to each pet, ensuring that they receive personalized care and attention. Our team of experienced professionals will work closely with you to develop acustomized treatment plan that meets your pet's specific requirements. Whether it's a routine check-up or a complex medical procedure, you can trust us to provide the highest level of care for your beloved pet.
WhyUsSection.title2: Ease and Convenience for Pet Owners
WhyUsSection.description2: We strive to make your experience as a pet owner as convenient as possible. Our clinic offers flexible appointment times, easy online booking, and a welcoming environment for both you and your pet. From the moment you walk in, you'll find our friendly staff ready to assist you with all your needs, making every visit smooth and stress-free.
WhyUsSection.description3: Our clinic provides a full spectrum of veterinary services to ensure your pet's overall health and well-being. From preventive care and routine check-ups to specialized treatments and surgeries, our team is equipped to handle all aspects of your pet's healthcare. Additionally, we offer expert advice on nutrition, behavior, and lifestyle to help you make informed decisions for your pet's care.
WhyUsSection.description4: Our clinic is equipped with the latest veterinary technology and advanced diagnostic tools to provide the highest standard of care for your pet. We continually update our techniques and equipment to stay at the forefront of veterinary medicine. This ensures that your pet receives the most effective and up-to-date treatment available.

ServicesList.singlePageTitleWhy: Why You Should Take The Service

GeneralCare.title: General Care and Treatment
GeneralCare.description: Comprehensive health care for pets including dogs, cats, reptiles, and rodents.
GeneralCare.imageAlt: Close-up veterinary doctor taking care of a pet
GeneralCare.aboutSection: Our General Care and Treatment service is designed to provide comprehensive health care for pets, including dogs, cats, reptiles, and rodents. We focus on ensuring your pets receive the best possible care through a range of services that cater to their health and well-being.
GeneralCare.whySection: Choosing our General Care and Treatment service ensures your pet receives top-notch medical attention from experienced veterinarians. Our holistic approach to pet care includes preventive measures and thorough treatment plans tailored to each pet's unique needs. We are dedicated to maintaining your pet's health and happiness, making us a trusted partner in their care.

1.title: Pre-Anesthetic Examination and Surgical Planning
1.description: Thorough evaluations before any surgical procedure to ensure safety and optimal outcomes.

2.title: Protective Vaccinations
2.description: Regular vaccinations to protect pets from various diseases, ensuring their long-term health.

3.title: Emergency Case Management
3.description: Swift and effective treatment for urgent medical conditions.

4.title: Issuance of Passports and National Database Registration
4.description: Facilitating the necessary documentation for pet travel and ensuring they are registered with national authorities.

Laboratory.title: Laboratory Diagnostics
Laboratory.description: Extensive lab services for accurate diagnostics and treatment planning.
Laboratory.aboutSection: Our Laboratory Diagnostics service offers extensive lab testing to ensure accurate diagnostics and effective treatment plans for your pets. Our state-of-the-art laboratory facilities enable us to perform a wide range of tests to monitor and manage your pet’s health.
Laboratory.whySection: Accurate diagnostics are crucial for effective treatment. Our Laboratory Diagnostics service provides precise and reliable results, enabling our veterinarians to develop targeted treatment plans. With our advanced lab facilities, you can trust us to provide the best care for your pet.

1.title: Complete Blood Count (Hematological and Biochemical Tests)
1.description: Comprehensive blood tests to assess overall health.

2.title: Microscopic Examination
2.description: Detailed analysis of blood smears, aspirates, scrapings, swabs, and sediments.

4.title: Rapid SNAP Tests
4.description: Quick testing for various diseases such as parvovirus, distemper, tick-borne diseases, heartworm, leishmaniasis, adenovirus, influenza virus, coronavirus, giardia, and feline-specific tests (FIV/FeLV, panleukopenia, giardia).

Surgery.title: Surgery
Surgery.description: Specialized surgical procedures for soft tissue, maxillofacial, eye, and dental surgeries.
Surgery.imageAlt: Close-up hands touching a dog preping for surgery
Surgery.aboutSection: Our Surgery service offers specialized surgical procedures performed by skilled veterinarians. We are equipped to handle a variety of surgeries, ensuring your pet receives the best possible care in a safe and controlled environment.
Surgery.whySection: Our experienced surgical team is dedicated to providing the highest standard of care during every procedure. We use the latest techniques and equipment to ensure successful outcomes and swift recovery for your pet. Trust us for all your pet’s surgical needs.

1.title: Soft Tissue Surgery
1.description: Surgical procedures involving internal organs and soft tissues.

2.title: Maxillofacial Surgery
2.description: Surgeries related to the jaws and face.

3.title: Eye and Eyelid Surgery
3.description: Procedures to address ocular and eyelid conditions.

4.title: Dental Surgery
4.description: Comprehensive dental care including extractions and oral surgery.

5.title: Castration/Sterilization
5.description: Safe and effective spaying and neutering services.

Reproduction.title: Reproduction and Obstetrics
Reproduction.description: Expert care in reproductive health and childbirth assistance.
Reproduction.aboutSection: Our Reproduction and Obstetrics service provides expert care in reproductive health and childbirth. We support pet owners through every stage of their pet's reproductive cycle, from conception to delivery.
Reproduction.whySection: Reproductive health is vital for breeding pets. Our specialized services ensure the health and safety of both mother and offspring. With our expertise, you can be confident in successful breeding and healthy litters.

1.title: Diagnosis and Treatment of Urogenital Diseases
1.description: Comprehensive care for reproductive system health.

2.title: Determination of Fertile Days
2.description: Accurate prediction of optimal breeding times.

3.title: Assistance with Natural Childbirth
3.description: Professional support during the birthing process.

Other.title: Other Services
Other.description: Additional services including vaccination and microchipping.
Other.imageAlt: Shaving process of a small dog
Other.aboutSection: In addition to our core services, we offer a variety of other essential services to support your pet's health and well-being. Our goal is to provide comprehensive care to meet all your pet's needs.
Other.whySection: Our additional services are designed to complement our primary offerings, providing all-around care for your pet. From preventive measures to specialized treatments, we ensure your pet stays healthy and happy. Choose our clinic for a full spectrum of veterinary care.

1.title: Ultrasonic Removal of Dental Tartar
1.description: Advanced dental cleaning to maintain oral health.

2.title: Sample Collection and Submission to Reference Laboratories
2.description: Precise sample collection for further analysis in specialized labs.

3.title: Microchipping
3.description: Permanent identification to ensure your pet can always be found.

question1.question: What is the best food for my pet?
question1.answer: The best food for your pet is the one that is balanced and provides all the necessary nutrients. It is important to consult with your veterinarian to determine the best diet for your pet.

question2.question: How often should I take my pet to the vet?
question2.answer: It is recommended to take your pet to the vet at least once a year for a check-up. However, if your pet is sick or has any health issues, you should take them to the vet as soon as possible.

question3.question: How can I keep my pet healthy?
question3.answer: To keep your pet healthy, you should provide them with a balanced diet, regular exercise, and plenty of fresh water. It is also important to take your pet to the vet for regular check-ups and vaccinations.

question4.question: What should I do if my pet is sick?
question4.answer: If your pet is sick, you should take them to the vet as soon as possible. It is important to consult with your veterinarian to determine the best course of action for your pet's health.

question5.question: How can I prevent my pet from getting sick?
question5.answer: To prevent your pet from getting sick, you should provide them with a balanced diet, regular exercise, and plenty of fresh water. It is also important to keep your pet up to date on their vaccinations and take them to the vet for regular check-ups.

ContactPage.medium-paragraph-right: Caring for a pet involves a holistic approach that addresses their physical health, emotional well-being and happiness.
ContactPage.woof-paragraph: I'm here to help, give me a call!
ContactPage.phone-p: Call us when you need us!
ContactPage.email-p: We are usually replying within 24 hours

ContactForm.name: Your First Name
ContactForm.subject: Message Subject
ContactForm.text-area: How can we help you? Feel free to get in touch!

AboutUsPage.large-heading: Providing Trusted Veterinary Care in Bihać for Over 6 Years
AboutUsPage.subheading: At PetVet, we are dedicated to offering top-quality veterinary services with a focus on reliability, professionalism, and modern care techniques.
AboutUsPage.large-heading-2: Committed to Continuous Advancement in Veterinary Practice
AboutUsPage.subheading-2: Our mission is to provide top-quality veterinary care based on modern procedures and expert knowledge, while our vision is to become a leader in veterinary practice through continuous improvement and adaptation to global standards. With clearly defined goals, we focus on enhancing the quality of life for pets and supporting responsible pet ownership.
AboutUsPage.subheading-3: At PetVet, we believe in the power of collaboration to make a meaningful difference in the lives of animals. Through our partnerships with respected organizations and NGOs, we work together to promote responsible pet ownership, support animal welfare initiatives, and provide essential veterinary care. Our collective efforts focus on improving the quality of life for pets and stray animals alike, ensuring they receive the care, protection, and love they deserve.

aboutCards.title: 10.000+ Satisfied Customers
aboutCards.description: Our commitment to exceptional pet care has earned the trust of thousands of happy customers who rely on us for their pets' health, happiness, and well-being.

aboutCards.title: 10+ Years Of Experience
aboutCards.description: With over a decade of expertise, our dedicated team provides high-quality veterinary services, ensuring your pet receives the best possible care at every stage of life.

aboutCards.title: Quality Products Only
aboutCards.description: We carefully select premium pet products that meet the highest standards, offering safe, nutritious, and effective solutions to support your pet’s healthy lifestyle.

mission.title: Delivering Compassionate and Professional Veterinary Care
mission.description: At PetVet, our mission is to provide exceptional veterinary services that go beyond treatment—we offer compassionate care that nurtures the bond between pets and their owners. Through modern medical techniques, a highly skilled team, and a heartfelt approach, we are dedicated to enhancing the quality of life for pets while fostering trust and reliability within our community.

vision.title: Creating a Future of Responsible Pet Ownership and Awareness
vision.description: We believe that a better future for all furry friends—both pets and strays—begins with education and awareness. Our vision is to inspire a shift in mindset across Bosnia, emphasizing the importance of responsible pet ownership and preventive care. Through continuous collaboration with communities, we strive to ensure that every animal receives the care, respect, and dignity they deserve.

goals.title: Ending the Stray Crisis Through Awareness and Action
goals.description: Stray animals are not just an issue—they are a consequence of human negligence. At PetVet, we are committed to solving this challenge the right way: by raising awareness and implementing sustainable neutering and sterilization programs. In partnership with NGOs and local authorities, we work tirelessly to prevent further suffering and build a compassionate society where every animal has a chance for a better life.

Footer.paragraph: At our veterinary clinic, consultations provide comprehensive insights into your pet's health and well-being.
Footer.paragraph-secondary: Join us on a journey of care where your pet takes center stage.
